speaker: Dungeon Master & NPCs
lines: Griffin McElroy

speaker: Magnus Burnsides
lines: Travis McElroy

speaker: Merle Highchurch
lines: Clint McElroy

speaker: Taako Taaco
lines: Justin McElroy

speaker: Episode 62 - The Stolen Century - Chapter Three

[Griffin starts with the commercial because it’s a shorter episode. He said they didn’t know it was going to be a whole episode when they finished recording and that they were doing this to get back on the right schedule after a couple of weeks of posting on wrong Thursdays.]
Announcer
lines: Who the heck was that nerd? The intro is my job! Just watch how it’s done. It’s the Adventure Zone!

speaker: [Stolen Century theme song plays, then “No Dogs on the Moon” fades into Griffin speaking]
Griffin
lines: Um, so in the last episode of Stolen Century, I think it’s safe to say maybe things got a little bleak, maybe a little bit dark. There was maybe, um— I may have ended Travis’s world that he made and worked really hard on.

speaker: Travis
lines: No, it’s non-canonical, Griffin. You ended a version of that in your universe, you know what I mean?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oh, ‘kay. And things got—

speaker: Clint
lines: TravWorld— TravWorld 2.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Travis
lines: Well it’s not called that, but okay.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Things got maybe a little fungal, a little gross, and maybe folks weren’t so into that. Um, and so I thought maybe for this episode we could lighten things up a little bit and I think the best way to do that is to have a good, ol’ fashioned beach episode.

speaker: Justin
lines: [crosstalk] Yeah!

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalk] Beach party!

speaker: Clint
lines: [imitates “Wipe Out”]

speaker: Justin
lines: No more wasting time composing music for the show, you’ve got fucking Michael Winslow over here.

speaker: Travis
lines: The guy from Family Matters?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oh, no. [crosstalk] Yeah…

speaker: Justin
lines: [crosstalk] Tsk, no.

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalk] What? Well…

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um—

speaker: Justin
lines: Is it? Eddie. You’re thinking of Eddie Winslow.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Sorry, Justin, were you just trying to figure out if Michael Winslow was the name of one of the characters on Family Matters real quick?

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah. Their last name was Winslow so [crosstalk] it’s not like it’s gonna be a wild stretch.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] No that’s fair.

speaker: Travis
lines: How— How could— How was that never…

speaker: Justin
lines: [crosstalk] Yeah.

speaker: Travis
lines: Well, we’ve talked enough about it, but how was that never a cameo appearance?

speaker: Justin
lines: How was that not like a [Michael Winslow voice] “Hey it’s me, your cousin, Michael! Hmmm RREE-bop-bop beedlee-bop-bop-reep!”

speaker: Clint
lines: [joining in] Sklee-bloo-woo-woo-woo!

speaker: Justin
lines: Fucking topical Michael Winslow references for everybody to enjoy here.

speaker: Griffin
lines: So— Yeah, that we just spent like a minute and a half on. So, in this cycle, the seven of you come down on the Starblaster and that name, um… It’s like a rich—

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalk] It gets better with age.

speaker: Griffin
lines: It’s like a rich honey. Everytime I say it, it just— Also, I apologize. I’m very croaky because I started Couch to 5k today and I almost died. And I—

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalk] ugh…

speaker: Griffin
lines: I think I’ve pooped some of my lung matter out and so I’m a little grumbly.

speaker: Um, so in this cycle the seven of you come down into what is essentially a completely uninhabited world. Um, most of it is under a huge ocean, only like five percent of this world is landmass. And you’re not really sure what the deal is after your sort of fly-over reconnaissance, uh whether civilizations used to exist here and collapsed and drowned or if they never existed or what. But, in a rare stroke of luck, when the Hunger first scopes you out and the Light of Creation falls, it falls just like, a day’s ride away from where you all are and so you find it and recover it, like, within the day with little issue.

And so the seven of you, like, have a year in this, like, pretty nice, tropical world and at sort of Davenport’s behest, you all decide to sort of take a break and have sort of a Mental Health Year. And so you all work together and you build this large, sort of comfortable shelter on a pleasant beach          right next to where the Starblaster’s parked and you spend a relatively peaceful year together just sort of, you know, fishing and cooking for one another and just sort of genuinely enjoying the break from this otherwise like really, really difficult journey. So with that in mind, how do you all spend your year?
Clint
lines: Hmmm.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I’m giving you all sort of more like freedom to, like, do whatever this time. There’s no, like, immediate— You’ve got the Light of Creation and this— I want to make it clear, this is not me trying to pull some sort of twist on you, like I wanted to give you like an opportunity to sort of you know, have a cycle to yourselves to do whatever without the apocalypse looming over you.

speaker: Clint
lines: Yeah, I think I’d like to be a… a beachcomber, and take all the shells and sharks’ teeth and drift wood and what have you, and make things… for my crewmates.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] Okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: Make things like you would find at, uh, Wings or one of those, you know, trinket stores. I wanna make some cheap crap for my friends.

speaker: Travis
lines: Well it’s not cheap if you picked— I guess it’s the cheapest because you picked— literally picked it up off the ground. [crosstalk] …try this.

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] Oh, I didn’t spend a damn dime on it!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um, okay. Well, give me an example of some of the stuff that you make and let’s— let’s play this out a little bit.

speaker: Clint
lines: Well, I’ll start with the— the primo stuff, the sharks’ teeth necklaces, you know, where you take the shark’s tooth and drill a little, tiny hole in it and, you know, spend a lot of time looking for the sharks’ teeth which enables you to get really bad sunburn so that’s kind of the downside. That what I’m sacrificing.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] Roll um— Do me a favor, roll plus mind and let’s, like, figure out, like, how successful you are at sort of digging stuff up.

speaker: Clint
lines: Sure, yeah. [rolls his dice] Um…  Wow, uh, 6 and a 1, that’s 7, and then an 8 is mind.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. Um, mixed success— I think you find, like, sharks’ teeth and wood. I think if you had rolled like a 10+ or something, you’d be like pulling out, like, fucking pearls and all kinds of, like, fancy stuff. But, yeah, you have the basics that you need to make stuff. So you make some sharks’ tooth— You make a shark’s tooth necklace. Who’s that for?

speaker: Clint
lines: Yeah, and then I’m— I’m gonna take the little, like, the shells I find and, like, glue googly-eyes on them because that’s always funny, and then make little bodies out of, like, pipe cleaner or whatever pipe cleaner is in this world.

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalk] You’re— I’m sorry, Dad. You’re gonna have to roll for googly-eyes. You can’t just…

speaker: Clint
lines: Oh, yeah, that’s true.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah. I think there’s, like, a special googly-eye roll. I think that’s plus body because you gotta really maneuver those little bad boys.

speaker: Clint
lines: Yeah, plus body. [rolls his dice] Now, I didn’t find any googly-eyes, apparently! [laughs]

speaker: Justin
lines: [laughs]

speaker: Travis
lines: [laughing] Okay. [crosstalk] I was gonna say...

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] Okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] That’s a 2 and a -1. That’s a crit 1.

speaker: Griffin
lines: And actually, based on the rules of the game, Dad… you die. [Travis starts laughing] You tried to put some googly-eyes on a shell and the shell broke and it cut— It cut you to ribbons. And you died.

speaker: Clint
lines: Ah, God.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I’m sorry. I— I thought this was just gonna be a fun—

speaker: Clint
lines: It’s just— No, no, no. It’s alright. I went doing what I loved and that was making—

speaker: Justin
lines: [crosstalk] Making trash.

speaker: Clint
lines: Making trash. [Travis and Clint laughing]

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um, so help me— Help me match some, like, gifts up to some people. Like, what did you give for Magnus?

speaker: Clint
lines: Oh, uh, for Magnus I made a fake arm, like a for your— For your upper arm. [struggling] You know, instead of gettin’ like a tribal tattoo, I got a bunch of driftwood and I strung it together to make, like, a, uh— like a… a forearm! An upper arm…

speaker: Griffin
lines: [laughing] I’m sorry! You made a— You made a— [laughing] You made a tattoo, you just— Just you drew it on a big piece of wood -

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] Yeah!

speaker: Griffin
lines: -that you then tied on to him-

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] Yeah!

speaker: Griffin
lines: This is— This is you invented the temporary tattoo.

speaker: Travis
lines: It’s almost like Dad doesn’t know the word jewelry.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You know, this is good.

speaker: Clint
lines: Well, no! This is more than jewelry. This is from the heart.

speaker: Griffin
lines: This is a piece of wood that you tie onto your arm.

speaker: Travis
lines: Um, I’m sorry. Jane Seymore’s Heart Collection, Dad?

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] Oooo.

speaker: Travis
lines: That’s from the heart.

speaker: Clint
lines: Yeah, that is true.

speaker: Griffin
lines: What’d you get Taako?

speaker: Clint
lines: Um, for Taako, I made him a pair of slippers out of that uh— Out of, uh, kelp. I found a bunch of kelp and I wove them together and I—

speaker: Griffin
lines: [laughing] These gifts suck! You got him slimy shoes!

speaker: Clint
lines: No, but—!

speaker: Justin
lines: Can we just do these as scenes for better presentation?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, do this scene of you giving these slime shoes to Taako.

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah, please.

speaker: Clint
lines: Yeah, um…

speaker: Merle
lines: Well, I, uh… I wasn’t sure your size, so, uh— There’s a lot of give in kelp and if they’re too small, get ‘em wet and they’ll get bigger and these— These are for you.

speaker: Taako
lines: Oh, well, thank you, my man. These are just beautiful!

speaker: Merle
lines: And the thing is, if you— If you don’t like wearing them, you can roll up raw seafood in ‘em and make sushi!

speaker: Taako
lines: Perfect! I’ll be sure to put these to good use.

speaker: Justin
lines: Let me know when his back is turned.

speaker: Merle
lines: Um, so anyway, Magnus—

speaker: Clint
lines: I turn.

speaker: Justin
lines: I cast Levitate on them.

speaker: Taako
lines: Oh no! Look at ‘em! Look at ‘em! Oh no! Oh no, my beautiful shoes!

speaker: Travis
lines: So, wait, you waited until his back was turned so you could draw his attention back to them?

speaker: Justin
lines: Well, he wouldn’t see me cast Levitate on them.

speaker: Travis
lines: Ah, I see [crosstalk]...

speaker: Griffin
lines: What are you doing by levi—? You just, like, throwing them up into the sky?

speaker: Justin
lines: Right. They’re just levitating away.

speaker: Taako
lines: Oh no, my beautiful shoes! [laughs]

speaker: Merle
lines: And, um—

speaker: Travis
lines: And when he turns back to look at the shoes, I cough and throw the arm bracelet into the ocean. [coughing]

speaker: Merle
lines: And then— And for you, Lup, I found a gigantic Portuguese man o’ war and I ripped its guts out and I made a shower cap for you—

speaker: Lup
lines: Oh, I don’t—

speaker: Merle
lines: And, you know, the tentacles kind of hang down and it looks like pink hair! So I thought— You know, you would like that, with your fashion sense—

speaker: Lup
lines: Cool! I don’t— I don’t want that.

speaker: Merle
lines: No! You will! You’ll love it ‘cause next time you shower~

speaker: Lup
lines: Mm, it’s a dead fish. I don’t want that on my head. Merle, you get that I don’t want that on my head, right?

speaker: Merle
lines: [laughs] I think you’re playing coy with me! I think this is probably something you’ve thought about for a long time.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. She takes it and, uh, throws it to the ground and it just kinda splatters as it hits the ground and she’s like,

speaker: Lup
lines: Oh no! A… A demon wh- while you were looking— An invisible demon that only I can see threw it to the ground! Aw, dern.

speaker: Merle
lines: And, uh, Lucretia, I, uh— I made this. It’s, uh, I took three sand dollars and made a Mickey Mouse head out of it.

speaker: Clint
lines: That’s M-I-K-K-E-E M-A-U-S, Mikkee Maus. Not a trademarked creature…

speaker: Lucretia
lines: [crosstalk] Just sort of another- sort of another dead fish hat.

speaker: Merle
lines: But! The thing is, if you’re ever drinking three glasses of beverage at the same time, it’s a triple coaster.

speaker: Lucretia
lines: Excellent. Great.

speaker: Merle
lines: Yeah, yeah! Consume that!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Barry is slowly backing out of the room that you’re standing in as you do this award presentation.

speaker: Merle
lines: It’s okay, Barry! Because, um… I’ll have to wait and make yours later, I’m not feeling real good from that— that cut I got from the shell. I’m gonna go lay down for a couple minutes.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You’re not actually gonna die from the shell. I want to make that clear.

speaker: Clint
lines: No! I like it! I like it! I wanna die from the shell!

speaker: Griffin
lines: You’re not gonna die from the shell during the Beach Episode.

speaker: Travis
lines: [laughs] That would make us all feel really bad about throwing your gifts away!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Nobody— Nobody dies during the beach episode! I forbid it.

speaker: Merle
lines: Well I— I still don’t feel good, I’m gonna go lay down.

speaker: Travis
lines: He ate some bad man o’ war.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, while you go lay down, I think Lucretia, who’s like the only person that, like, kept your gift, maybe, comes to, like, check on you to make sure you’re good and, um— She’s talking to you and she says, um…

speaker: Lucretia
lines: Um, Merle it seems like your gift-giving didn’t go maybe as well as you wanted and, um, I just wanted to apologize for the rest of the crew. They told me to— They definitely told me to come in here and apologize for how rude they were, um… But, I gotta say, I’m impressed at sort of how well you’ve taken to this… This #BeachLife. It seems like you’ve really kind of, you know— It seems like you’re really comfortable here. It seems like you’re really, I don’t know, happy here.

speaker: Merle
lines: I like it here. I could see myself settling down here. Um, except, you know, for the toxic, exploding shells, it’s— It’s not bad! Um… Thank you, but did— Did you say they… They didn’t like my gifts?

speaker: Lucretia
lines: I… No. Ye— What did you… What did you say? I got confused by…

speaker: Merle
lines: Oh, I thought you were saying that they didn’t like my- [crosstalk]

speaker: Lucretia
lines: No, I thought you said that— I thought that you said that. I thought you said that? I—

speaker: Merle
lines: No! Oh, no, they loved them! Did you not see their faces?

speaker: Lucretia
lines: They were… Filled with childlike glee. Anyway, you lay down—

speaker: Merle
lines: [crosstalk] It was— Yeah…

speaker: Lucretia
lines: You lay down and rest up.

speaker: Griffin
lines: And she leaves.

speaker: Merle
lines: Yeah, I’m gonna dig a little hole in the sand to puke in.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Justin and Travis, what do you think I should give Dad for this scene? I don’t know if—

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalk] Asset.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Merle, did you make anything for yourself that we could count as an asset or is this a bond... I think an asset, just because you made some shit. What did you make— I want you to have made something for yourself to, sort of, remind you of this beach world. What was it?

speaker: Clint
lines: Yes, of course! I took a piece of driftwood and I embedded sharks’ teeth in it and now it’s a wicked… club!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. Yeah, sure! Fuck it! Yeah, that’s cool. Like it’s a little… little, uh, uh, warrior’s style, improvised, beach weapon.

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] Like something that The Rock would use!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. Yeah, okay. Take one asset for your…

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] And I’m gonna call it The Rock!

speaker: Griffin
lines: I think this also isn’t the only— Since it’s a year, this is probably not the only gifts that you made for folks but, um, with that roll, I think they were of equivalent value. But go ahead and take an asset for this thing that you’ve made for yourself.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um… Taako and [high pitched] Magnus…?

speaker: Travis
lines: So I— Here’s what I’m picturing Magnus sees a piece of driftwood. Picks it up. Stares deeply into it. Sees the grain. Is looking at the different shape of the wood, like, you know, getting it real close to his eye. And then he yells,

speaker: Magnus
lines: Lup! Pull!

speaker: And throws it up as high as he can!
Griffin
lines: Okay. And, sure enough, Lup just, like, Magic Missile’s it the fuck out of the sky. She actually, like… Devil May Cry style, like, combos, air-juggles, it up in the air. And she’s just, like, standing on the ship— She was very far away from you when this happened. So from, like, a hundred meters away, you just hear her shout,

speaker: Lup
lines: Rad!

speaker: And she gives you a thumbs up. [Justin giggles] So what is this sort of, like… What are you envisioning here?
Travis
lines: I’m envisioning it being kind of like a… a training year for Magnus but also, like, keeping everyone on their toes kind of thing.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] Ohhhh, okay!

speaker: Travis
lines: So, you know, just throughout the course of the year, kind of like, a- y’know, Magnus jumps out from behind a rock at Cap’n Port or like—

speaker: Griffin
lines: Let’s do that! Okay, Cap’n Port just sort of walking out on the beach. He’s having some Cap’n Port time, some alone time. Um, He’s got, like, a bottle of wine that he brought from a previous world and he’s just, like, this is the place that he wants to drink it at. So he, like, sits down, rolls out a blanket, sits down on the beach. It’s sunset as the tide is rolling out and just is, like, really enjoying this glass of wine. And you— I guess this is when you pull your— [chuckles] Just makes sure he’s on his toes! You… What do you do? To, like…

speaker: Travis
lines: Just jump out from behind a rock and yell,

speaker: Magnus
lines: MAGNUS!

speaker: Griffin
lines: [Laughing] Okay. I mean, he spills pretty much the entire— He throws the glass of— You know when you get, like, really scared and you’re holding something, you will just, like, launch it? I think he just, like, throws the entire glass of wine he was holding and the glass into the ocean. And was like,

speaker: Davenport
lines: M—! What the f— Why?! That was… That was—

speaker: Magnus
lines: You gotta be ready!

speaker: Travis
lines: And then I run away. [Laughs]

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um… Okay. So, you wanna do— Gimme one more. Give me one more of your training— your surprise training regimen.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay. I’m gonna go with, uh… You know, uhh, Merle!

speaker: Griffin
lines: [Laughs] Okay! What do you do to Merle?

speaker: Merle
lines: Wh— [barfs] What?

speaker: Travis
lines: Merle— [laughs]

speaker: Merle
lines: [crosstalks] I’m still shell-shocked.

speaker: Travis
lines: While Merle’s still lying sick in bed, I’m hiding underneath his bed. [Clint laughs]

speaker: Griffin
lines: [laughing] And how does this resolve?

speaker: Travis
lines: As he’s puking, I stand up silently beside the bed so that when he comes back from puking into a bucket, there I am.

speaker: Magnus
lines: [whispers] Magnus.

speaker: Merle
lines: [interrupted puking noise]—WAAAGH! Why would you do that?

speaker: Magnus
lines: Merle! Attacks could come at any time, Merle. [whispers] You gotta be ready!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh—

speaker: Magnus
lines: [crosstalks] Magnus!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Magnus, go ahead and roll plus heart, I guess, to see if you just fuckin’ annoy everybody, maybe—

speaker: Travis
lines: I thought this would be experience but okay… [rolls dice]

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalks] I don’t— I don’t think it’s… Eh, I mean everybody else is getting experience. How about this, based on your heart roll, let’s see how you do.

speaker: Travis
lines: I rolled a 7 plus 1, it’s an 8.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. Here’s— I’m gonna offer you a choice with that. Either you can take one bond as represented by just like, I don’t know, there’s probably a couple of folks on the crew who, like, enjoy this, or you can let Merle and Taako take +1 experience for your training them.

speaker: Travis
lines: I will let them take +1 experience.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Alright. Merle and Taako, take +1 experience.

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalks] Thank you!

speaker: Justin
lines: [crosstalks] Oh yeah!

speaker: Travis
lines: That was my goal! [crosstalks] … my team.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalks] Yeah, I like the way— I like the way that resolved. Taako.

speaker: Taako
lines: Whuut’s up?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Do you have an idea for what you want to do?

speaker: Justin
lines: Guess what I’m gonna do this year.

speaker: Griffin
lines: What’s that?

speaker: Justin
lines: I’m going to… learn to surf.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [laughs explosively] Alright, um…

speaker: Justin
lines: I’m gonna have— First, I’m gonna work with Magnus to find a nice, light wood that he can carve into a basic shape—

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oooh… Okay, one thing here. I don’t know if Magnus is a carpenter yet. Like, Magnus, are you a carpenter? I thought that might be something that happens eventually but, like— and obviously Magnus becomes a carpenter after we arrive on the… on Podcast Planet. But I don’t… [crosstalk] This is— I mean, we can talk—

speaker: Justin
lines: Hey, hey—

speaker: Griffin
lines: We can talk about this. Magnus, do you have an upbringing that would make you, like, a good carpenter? Is this— think— It kind of felt like something that you pick up along the way.

speaker: Clint
lines: Maybe this is where he picks it up! He’s got a whole year!

speaker: Justin
lines: Well, I mean… I don’t— [crosstalks] I need to start surfing…

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalks] I’m not poo-pooing this idea just… yeah.

speaker: Travis
lines: No, I will say that like—

speaker: Justin
lines: Hey, beloved— Also, I should mention that, like, I’m, um, am a magic boy so, like, I can make another surfboard. Like,

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalks] No, this is— This is not—

speaker: Justin
lines: I was trying to be nice for your fantasy game but, like, I can get— [Clint and Griffin laugh] I can, like, get a surfboard, okay?

speaker: Griffin
lines: No, this is not me trying to shoot down your idea. This is me trying to come up with, like— Trying to figure out what the cool story is here. Like, is Mag-

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalks] Yeah, I would say that at this point, at this point Magnus is not yet a carpenter but if you need me to hack apart a piece of wood—

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalks] But! But but but but—

speaker: Travis
lines: -to start with, I can do that.

speaker: Griffin
lines: We have a character that just spent a whole year sort of salvaging beach materials into, like, cool shit. I think Merle, maybe, could make you a surfboard pretty good at this point.

speaker: Justin
lines: Okay…

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalks] So it was cool shit! I told ya!

speaker: Travis
lines: Um… Well…

speaker: Griffin
lines: This surfboard’s pretty cool. Alright, you got a surfboard. What’s it look like, because I imagine you can… do some magic to make it look righteous?

speaker: Justin
lines: It’s a Magic Carpet design. It’s a Mellow Cruiser, good for lazy days and lazy waves.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Did you just Google that or…?

speaker: Justin
lines: Nah, just kind of “off the— the top of my head” stuff that I know about surfboards. [Clint laughing] And, uh, of course I’ll use transmutation magic to glass the outside of it because I don’t have access to fiberglass, uh, sheeting. So I’m going to use the outside to glass it. Just like a cool… surfboard.

speaker: Travis
lines: Now, Justin, on that board will you be able to hang, like, eight or nine…

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah, I’m probably going to hang ten on this bad boy!

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalks] Woah!

speaker: Justin
lines: That’s kind of my— I know! That’s kind of my plan.

speaker: Clint
lines: Oh, you know what? I’m gonna remember that to use as, like, a magic spell to make something fly.

speaker: Justin
lines: Perfect. I’m laying the groundwork, laying the scenes.

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalks] By the way! The name of the surfboard is Woody.

speaker: Justin
lines: No, it isn’t.

speaker: Clint
lines: It’s Woody, yeah…

speaker: Justin
lines: It isn’t. No. It’s called the Wavecarver. [Clint laughs] And keeping— Keeping in line with our perfect naming conventions, the Wavecarver is awesome and it’s got, obviously, bitchin’ flame decals on every inch.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalks] Okay.

speaker: Justin
lines: Like anywhere you look at it, it looks like awesome flame decals. And I’m just going to, like—

speaker: Travis
lines: How do you keep them from bleeding into each other?

speaker: Justin
lines: Well, I glassed it after I put the design on there, so…

speaker: Travis
lines: But wouldn’t all the flames— Wouldn’t it just look like one big flame?

speaker: Justin
lines: Woah. Trav, you just described a pretty cool surfboard! [All laugh]

speaker: Griffin
lines: Alright, what is this— I don’t think there’s anybody on the team who knows how to surf, so is this just self-taught, um— Just, like, you getting out on the waves? How does Taako know what surfing is?

speaker: Justin
lines: I’m inventing surfing, Griffin.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [laughs] Alright…

speaker: Justin
lines: I’m inventing surfing. My p- Let me tell you this, my original plan for this year was to just piss it off.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Alright.

speaker: Justin
lines: Like my original plan for this year was just to, like, not fucking do anything. That was my first instinct. And I feel like Taako, at some point, just got bored with that. Like, that was his first plan for, like, the first two weeks was not to do shit. Saving his energy for the challenges in classic Survivor tradition. And, instead, he’s gonna try to learn how to surf.

speaker: Griffin
lines: So you just— You just get out there and just start humping those waves or, um, just working your way up to the big ha—to the big pipes?

speaker: Justin
lines: I think it started with, like, floating—

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalks] Okay.

speaker: Justin
lines: —on the board just to, like, get away from everybody and then, eventually, got too far out and had to try to learn how to surf back in.

speaker: Clint
lines: Didn’t, uh, Magnus throw his wood arm bracelet I gave him into the ocean?

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Clint
lines: Maybe that was an inspiration. You saw it floating on the water—

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oh, that’s good! You saw it just, like, getting pushed around by the waves and you’re like, “I’d love to be on that.”

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah or one of the chunks that—uh, uh, Lup blew out of the sky was floating, like, “Well that seems chill.”

speaker: Griffin
lines: So, uh, roll plus body.

speaker: Justin
lines: [strained] Damn, didn’t really think through that one. [Travis laughs] It’s really more about— It’s really more about heart, if you think about it.

speaker: Travis
lines: Yeah, think about it, Griffin. You’ve seen Johnny Tsunami.

speaker: Justin
lines: [rolls dice] Uh… Hey! That’s a 9 -1, so 8.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. Um… I don’t think— Take +1 experience. I don’t think, I don’t think you ever get— I don’t think you ever crush, like—

speaker: Justin
lines: [deadpan] Incorrect.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I don’t think you ever crush that big— Those big pipes. I don’t think—

speaker: Justin
lines: Incorrect.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalks] Oh, you do—

speaker: Justin
lines: I think I do once, right?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, here’s what—

speaker: Justin
lines: [crosstalks]  I probably, like—

speaker: Griffin
lines: — Here’s what you do You are a competent surfer, and you pick it up pretty quickly and you’re surfin’ pretty good. Um, and in doing so, I think you just, like— Maybe this is when you become a little bit more dexterous, right? Like, maybe this is where Sweet Flips, like, starts going because you need some of that stuff to be, like, good at surfing.

speaker: Justin
lines: [crosstalks] Okay.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um, and you… I think Lup watches you, like, surf sometimes when you, like, go out for your lessons but then she gets bored because she’s not the one surfing, and so she goes back to doing what she does.

speaker: Justin
lines: [crosstalk] Sounds about right.

speaker: Griffin
lines: But, Barry Bluejeans is, like, a big fan. Barry Bluejeans loves watching you… do it. He’s like, kind of hypnotized. So you spend a lot of the year, like, practising surfing in addition to, like, all the other hanging out that you do with everybody. Um, and after, like, one session of coming in, Barry Bluejeans is, like,

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: Wow, good day today, Taako… you, uh…

speaker: Griffin
lines: This is what Barry sounds like, right?

speaker: Travis
lines: Sure.

speaker: Clint
lines: Who remembers?

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah, I don’t… I don’t.

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: Boy, that was a good day out there today, Taako. You were really— eatin’ that foam up, just really carving that spray. Um… Hey, can I ask you, um… Can I ask you a favor?

speaker: Taako
lines: Sure. Yeah, of course.

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: I made myself, like, pretty vulnerable here and I hope that you can appreciate that and I know that we haven’t— We’ve been traveling together for, um, two decades but we haven’t really had much time to get to know each other, um… Will you— Ah, fuck… Will you teach me how to swim?

speaker: Taako
lines: Yeah— Wait… Oh, you’re kind of a barney, huh?

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: A what?

speaker: Taako
lines: Barney. It’s surfer slang. It’s like an inexperienced surfer. [Clint laughing] We call it a— We call ‘em a barney.

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: I’m— I mean, I’ll never get up on that graceful board and carve that spray the way you do but just like, everybody else goes swimming all the time and I just don’t know how to do it and it’s like… It’s getting to the point where it’s like, I’m a grown-ass man and it’s just kind of—

speaker: Taako
lines: [crosstalk] Sure.

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: —embarrassing and, I don’t know… It’s stupid. I can ask Magnus if you want I just thought that maybe. You’re just so good out there on the water that maybe—

speaker: Magnus
lines: [from down the beach] What did you say? What did you need?

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: Boy, this beach really— Sound really carries across it, huh? [Clint laughs]

speaker: Magnus
lines: Did you say somethin’? [Griffin and Clint laugh]

speaker: Merle
lines: [makes barfing noise]

speaker: Magnus
lines: I heard my name.

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: It’s just, everytime— every—

speaker: Merle
lines: [barfing in the background]

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: Everytime Merle barfs, I hear it no matter where I am. It’s just sort of in my head constantly. Taako, will you teach me how to fucking swim, please? I’m just gettin’— I’m— Now I’m gettin’ antsy.

speaker: Taako
lines: Yeah, man, dawn patrol. We’ll get out there first thing in the morning.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um, okay. You teach… You teach him how to swim and he’s really bad at it. And he… I think you have to sort of make him some sort of magic ear plugs in order for him to even do it but, um…

speaker: Justin
lines: Mm-hm.

speaker: Griffin
lines: It actually becomes like a… Like a thing. Like, every morning you go out and you get that— You get that good morning surf in and then Barry comes out to, like, root you on and then you give him some… give him some swimming lessons. Um, and now people will stop tweeting about me that I said that one of Barry’s favorite things is swimming in a cold lake on a hot day and then two episodes later say he didn’t know how to swim. [Clint laughs] Um…

speaker: Travis
lines: Yeah, so take that!

speaker: Griffin
lines: No, you all got me. You razzed me good. Um, and in doing so, I think you and Barry become, um, a bit closer together. Um, and roll— Roll plus Heart for me real quick.

speaker: Justin
lines: [rolls dice] Uhh, that is… Oh, uh… 11.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Alright, um… Hm… He says,

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: Boy, Taako, I sure—

speaker: It’s close to the end of the year now and you’re both very good at what you do in that big, beautiful, blue ocean. He says, uh,
Barry Bluejeans
lines: Boy, Taako, I appreciate it. I feel like I’ve… There have been times where I haven’t been able to hang out with everybody ‘cause y’all go swimmin’ and there are times where there’s people I, like, you know, want to hang out with and I just haven’t been able to do it and that’s not a good look and it makes me look like a big nerd and I, um…

speaker: Taako
lines: Mm-hm.

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: It’s just that— I just, like— I don’t know. It’s… Nevermind, it’s stupid. Thanks for teaching me how to swim!

speaker: Taako
lines: Wh— Well, what? I’m mean, you… You coulda just come out with us. I mean what are you… Who are you afraid of looking silly in front of?

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: It’s— Don’t worry about it. It’s nothin’. I, uh… I—

speaker: Taako
lines: [sing-song] Barryyyy!

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: [crosstalks] We should get back to the ship.

speaker: Taako
lines: Barry, I rolled an 11~! [all laugh] You gotta tell me, Barry!

speaker: Griffin
lines: He says, um…

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: I just think, you know, it’s like all, all of you… I don’t wanna be— I don’t wanna embarrass myself in front of and, like… For example, just like… For example, like… Like… Lup. I look… I look—

speaker: Taako
lines: [crosstalk] Okay…

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: Yeah, I look up to Lup a lot. You know, I don’t wanna be out there flounderin’ around, splashin’ around like some sort of goobus so, um… Just thank— Just—

speaker: Taako
lines: Uh, I see where you’re going with this, Barry. You— Listen, this is not a surprise to me. You’ve ever heard the term ‘locked in’? It’s when a wave crashes and the surfer is inside it. [Griffin laughs]

speaker: Clint
lines: [laughing] It’s more surfer terminology!

speaker: Taako
lines: It’s like kind of one of our surfer lingos and that’s when you real—

speaker: Griffin
lines: Real quick! Real quick! It’s been a year, is your— Is your hair longer now? Is your hair, like, sort of cru— A little bit surf crunchy?

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah. [someone clapping] Better than— Better than ever, and… I have a puka-shell necklace that I made and the special thing about the enchantment that I made when I transmuted— transmutated it, is that the moment we leave this reality, it disintegrates. Like, it can’t exist outside of this. This is not my perma-look. This is just—

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] Sorry, I did not mean— I did not mean to interrupt your speech to Barry. I just needed to know if you were, like, full-blown Bodhi or not.

speaker: Clint
lines: Hey, do you— Do you want a, uh, seaweed leisure suit to go with your puka-necklace?Taako Absolutely not. I’m worried that would me

speaker: ss up my lines. Um, so…

Barry, you’re locked in and this wave’s crashin’ all around you, my man and I— I don’t begrudge you… anything. You know, we’ve lost a lot, uh, and there’s a lot more we might lose but the one thing we do have is the thing that people in love rarely ever have enough of, and it’s time.
Barry Bluejeans
lines: Oh, I— I don’t know about… You know, I don’t know about in love. It’s only been tw— Um… Twenty-one years…

speaker: Taako
lines: Sure. Sure.

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: Sh— Shit.

speaker: Taako
lines: Barry—

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: Um…

speaker: Taako
lines: Barry, I— You got all the time in the world, my man.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Alright, let’s call it there, that’s good. That’s a good cycle. Um… I don’t think— I don’t think we need to, like—

speaker: Travis
lines: Do we escape?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, you escape and it’s just fine—

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalk] Oh, whew!

speaker: Griffin
lines: —I don’t think we need to, like, I don’t think we need to get into… Into that. I don’t think we need to, I would actually like to, like, not maybe put as much an emphasis on, like, the… the end of it. But you have the Light and you fly away. This— This world is… saved, not that there was much here for them to attack, um… and maybe the last thing they see is, like, as you… Hm, you know what would be good here actually? Hmmm, is this the place to do it? I think this is the place to do it. Okay!

speaker: Uh, about a week before… the end of this cycle, um, Lucretia has been working on something this entire, uh— This entire year as, like, a gift for everybody that is, um, that— That she, she’s really excited about but she’s been very reclusive about and hasn’t let you all know. And, uh, when the year’s almost up, you all are having just one more beach rager, um… Is there a word for dawn patrol but at, like, night, Taako? Surfer, Bodhi Taako?
Justin
lines: Regular surfing, I guess. [Travis laughs]

speaker: Griffin
lines: I— I think you—

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalks] Eve patrol.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I think you guys just have like a nice little cook out and you see, just, Taako, just effortlessly sailing over the waves. Um, and Merle, at this point, you’re all— You’re all—

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalks] I sneak up on— I sneak up on Barry.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. And do what?

speaker: Travis
lines: Uh, I jump out from behind a rock but maybe, Griffin I’m gonna need you to roll to see if Barry anticipates it!

speaker: Griffin
lines: No, I’m never gonna roll any dice while playing this game. He, you, you sneak up on him and he, like, throws his head, like, kind of forward as you sort of grab him from behind as his glasses go flying off his face. Um, and right as they’re about to be, like, dashed on the rocks, like… Lup, like reaches down and catches them really quick and hands them back to Barry, who kinda blushes.

speaker: Travis
lines: And I just whisper in his ear,

speaker: Magnus
lines: [whispers] Magnus!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um, and… Taako, you come back in and you all have, like, one last, sort of, great night here and… Lucretia—

speaker: Justin
lines: You know I’m getting a low-country boil going, by the way. [Travis laughs]

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, for sure.

speaker: Justin
lines: Noo questione [sic].

speaker: Griffin
lines: And Lucretia, as you all are about to go in to, to, to sleep, to leave the next morning, um, Lucretia unveils what she’s been working on and it’s just a portrait of the seven of you here in this world and you’re all wearing your uniforms and, um, for once, you all look just so happy.

speaker: [Guitar music picks up and then fades out to the sound of waves]
